summary: Use this API to set the invoice number for the specified order
description: Use this API to set the invoice number for the specified order.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/order/invoice_number/set')
request.add_api_parameter("order_item_id", "123")
request.add_api_parameter("invoice_number", "INV-20")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/order/invoice_number/set')
request.add_api_param('order_item_id', '123')
request.add_api_param('invoice_number', 'INV-20')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.description: Order Item ID is incorrect, please verify

error_codes.message: "E034: Order Item must be packed. Please call setStatusToReadyToShip before"
error_codes.description: Canceled or pending orders are not allowed to call this API
